knimeNode.name: Google Drive Connection
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create a connection to Google Drive

fullDescription.intro:
This node provides a connection to the Google Drive service.
There is no configuration. This node supports a user's "My Drive" and "Team Drives".
Currently, the Google Sheets Service Provider and Google Sheets Interactive Service Provider nodes can be used for the input port. This node will use that incoming connection to broker a connection to Google Drive.
Only non-native Google file types are supported (i.e. Google Docs, Google Sheets, etc. are not supported due to API restrictions).

ports.inPort: A port object containing the Google API connection information
ports.outPort: A port object connection that can be used to access Google Drive
